teams.name: Denton Family
teams.loan_because: We decided to make charitable donations each Christmas instead of giving each other presents. This year Kiva is our organization of choice.

teams.name: Orthodox Christian Kiva
teams.loan_because: All men and women are made in the image and after the likeness of God.
teams.description: We're the clergy, monastics, laypeople, catechumens and friends of the Eastern Orthodox Christian Church, a church whose history can be traced in unbroken continuity all the way back to Christ and His twelve apostles.

teams.name: Belgium
teams.loan_because: Its a nice way to help the beneficiaries of the loans create their own business and hopefully improve their lives.
teams.description: Team of the Belgian citizens & residents and of the fans of Belgian Waffles, Chocolate & Beers !

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about the suffering of human beings.
teams.description:
We know we are one human family.

**New to the team? Read this: http://is.gd/51mxq

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising

teams.name: Scott Fellows Inc.
teams.loan_because:
If we wish to maintain stable life on earth, all societies need three things:
1 - Education
2 - Health Care
3 - Family Planning
If we empower individuals to take control of their lives it will not only benefit them but the effects will ripple across the world.

"All that is necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing."
- Edmund Burke, 1729 - 1779
teams.description: A group of friends and family banded together to bit by bit transform the world into a better place.

teams.name: Omar Mirza's Most Excellent Friends
teams.description: Very diverse group of people working together for a single cause: to help out others.

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!
